name: Football Mixed Bag Quiz | World  Football Challenge | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Leeds United beat 6-0 in the 2000-01 Champions League?
Which Italian team comes from the city of Bergamo?
Which of these clubs has never had an artificial pitch?
What national team has Shaun Goater played for?
What is the second part to the name of this club: Hajduk ________ ?
Who scored the second goal for Italy in the 1982 World Cup Final?
Which London club did Allan Simonsen play for during the 1980s?
Where was former England defender Terry Butcher was born?
Which Spanish club did Manchester United loan Jordi Cruyff to in 2000?
Young Boys are a club from which country?
